name: Crowd Rush
description:
Features of Crowd Rush - Destroy 5G Towers: 

- The game session lasts about 3-5 minutes 

- City has 10 types, small and large maps 

- Your goal is to damage all the 5G towers in the city and capture the population of the world.

This game is part of the Totem network of games. Use your unique Totem Avatars in the game for exclusive features.

Don't have an Avatar yet? Get one for free through the Totem Explorer website!
